description: Winter's unique way of making everyone look ready for a snowball fight.
title: Winter Warriors
n_1: A crisp winter morning, Max and Lily meet at the park.
n_2: They notice everyone's bulky jackets and gloves.
c1_2: Looks like an invisible snowball fight.
c2_2: I've got my arsenal right here!
n_3: Laughing, they pretend to dodge and throw snowballs.
n_4: Continuing their walk, they enjoy the playful atmosphere.
c1_4: Winter truly turns everyone into warriors.
